pros: I was working in the project office of SDPI. And my review is only about the project office. Overall it was a really good experience, learned a lot, working environment was good, salary was market competitive.
cons: Once again my review is only about the project office that I worked in. First of all there was no specific hours of working. Most of the times we had to work overtime (10-12 hours) without any compensation or appreciation. Second thing was favouritism towards some employees, who would take multiple days off, short leaves regularly and less work and still get more salary.
